about_the_game:
Get a glimpse into the main roster of characters that'll tell the story of Convento, and be introduced to a major plot hook that'll drive their dreams and motivations.

The final game has a much bigger focus on learning about the characters and their development. Meeting them for the first time, seeing them grow, and seeing how they connect with one another - that's one of our biggest focuses. We felt we couldn't do this justice for the demo, as this is the type of experience that couldn't be cut short for the sake of demonstration. So instead, we opted to show a little bit of (almost) everyone.

With the demo, we hope players can get a feel for the characters, the story, the themes, the artwork, and the game's flow.

The final game will have some interactable elements, brief moments of introspection and making choices.
